# $\textbf{\underline{AAT Level 2 Revision}}$

```{r Ver1, include = FALSE}

# Generate

BUSs <- c("InnovateX", "TechSphere", "FutureWave", "QuantumLeap", "NexGen Solutions", "TasteBud Haven", "Epicurean Delight", "SavorStreet", "Gourmet Grove", "Bistro Bliss", "Vitality Vibes", "Zenith Health", "PureWell", "Serenity Sanctuary", "ThriveWellness", "ChicNest" ,"TrendFusion", "ElegantEssence", "Urban Vogue", "StyleSavvy", "ShopEase", "MarketMingle", "UrbanBazaar", "RetailHaven", "EcoMercantile", "Visionary Creations", "CreativePulse", "MediaMosaic", "InspireStudio", "Artistry Avenue", "PrimeNest Realty", "Skyline Estates", "Horizon Homes", "UrbanNest", "LuxuryLiving Realty", "WealthWise", "PrimeInvest", "FortuneFlow", "SecureFuture", "LegacyCapital", "WanderLuxe", "VoyageVista", "TranquilTrails", "AdventureAwaits", "GlobalGetaways", "BrightMinds Academy", "KnowledgeQuest", "LearnSphere", "FuturePath", "EduElevate")

NoOfSL <- 2
NoOfPL <- 2
NoOfComp <- NoOfSL + NoOfPL

INVs <- c(sample(10:999,4))

# Making the string of businesses to use
SBUs <- sample(1:length(BUSs), NoOfComp)
Busins <- c(BUSs[SBUs])

NOMsP <- paste0("PL",sample(10:99,NoOfPL))
NOMsS <- paste0("SL",sample(10:99,NoOfSL))

AMs <- c(sample(111:999,4))
AMs[1] <- sample(111:333, 1) # credit payables
AMs[2] <- sample(111:333, 1) # credit payables
AMs[3] <- sample(333:999, 1) # credit receievables
AMs[4] <- sample(777:999, 1) # credit receievables


CHQs <- c(sample(111:999, 5))

MONs <- c(sample(111:999,4))
MONs[1] = sample(400:999, 1) # cash sales
MONs[2] = sample(400:999, 1) # rent received
MONs[3] = sample(111:333, 1) # vehicle repairs
MONs[4] = sample(111:333, 1) # purchases

RECs <- c(sample(11111:99999,2))

CNs <- c(sample(11:99, 2))

```

$\text{\underline{Post the following transactions into one of the given Day Books and then finally post the Totals into the T-accounts at the end:}}$

1. You receive an invoice (no `r INVs[1]`) from a Creditor called "`r Busins[1]`" (`r NOMsP[1]`) for £`r AMs[1]` plus VAT
2. You receive an invoice (no `r INVs[2]`) from a Creditor called "`r Busins[2]`" (`r NOMsP[2]`) for £`r AMs[2]` plus VAT (5% Prompt Payment Discount is offered)
3. You sent an invoice (no `r INVs[3]`) to a Debtor called "`r Busins[3]`" (`r NOMsS[1]`) for £`r AMs[3]` **inclusive of VAT**
4. You sent an invoice (no `r INVs[4]`) to a Debtor called "`r Busins[4]`" (`r NOMsS[2]`) for £`r AMs[4]` plus VAT (we allow them 5% Prompt Payment Discount)
5. We pay `r Busins[1]` £`r AMs[1]*1.2` by Cheque (`r CHQs[1]`)
6. We pay `r Busins[2]` in full by Cheque (`r CHQs[2]`) minus the prompt payment discount offered
7. We receive a Cheque (`r CHQs[3]`)  from `r Busins[3]` for £`r AMs[3]`
8. We receive a Cheque (`r CHQs[4]`) from `r Busins[4]` **to settle their invoice** at the lower rate as their $\text{\underline{prompt payment discount was taken in time}}$
9. We receive £`r MONs[1]` (inclusive of VAT) from cash-sales to the public, all received in CASH.
10. We receive £`r MONs[2]` by cheque (`r CHQs[5]`) for rent (no VAT)
11. We pay £`r MONs[3]` plus VAT for vehicle repairs with CASH (Receipt no `r RECs[1]`)
12.	We make last minute Purchases of goods for resale, for £`r MONs[4]` plus VAT paid by debit card. (Receipt no `r RECs[2]`).
13. We send out the Prompt Payment Credit Note to `r Busins[4]` (C.Note `r CNs[1]`)
14. We receive the Prompt Payment Credit Note from `r Busins[2]` (C Note `r CNs[2]`)

&nbsp;

$\textit{\underline{Important note before you begin}}$

*Please use the number of the question instead of a date when completing Day Books*

*When posting from Daybooks into T-Accounts use abbreviated details in the Accounts such as PDB (for Purchase Day Book)*

*You may find it easier to pull pages apart for these types of tasks (especially the back two)*

```{r Setup flextable, include=FALSE}
library(flextable)
set_flextable_defaults(fonts_ignore=TRUE)

big_border = fp_border_default(color="black", width = 0.3)
brdr <- fp_border_default(color = "black", width = 1.5)
white <- fp_border_default(color = "white", width = 0.3)

gdtools::register_gfont()
```

```{r PDB Table Empty, include=FALSE}

PDBedf <- data.frame(Date = c("  ", "  ", "  ", "DR / CR:"),
                     Supplier = c("  ", "  ", "TOTALS", "  "), 
                     Invoice.no. = c("  ", "  ", "-----","-----"), 
                     Folio = c("  ", "  ","-----", "-----"), 
                     Gross.Total = c("  ","  ","  ", "  "),
                     VAT = c("  ","  ","  ", "  "),
                     Net.Amount = c("  ","  ","  ", "  "))

PDBe <- flextable(data = head(PDBedf))

PDBe <- hrule(PDBe, rule = "atleast", part = "body")
PDBe <- hrule(PDBe, rule = "atleast", part = "header")
PDBe <- set_header_labels(PDBe, Invoice.no. = "Invoice  No.", Gross.Total = "Gross  Total", Net.Amount = "Net  Amount")
PDBe <- line_spacing(PDBe, i = 1, space = 1.6, part = "header")
PDBe <- align(PDBe, align = "center", part = "header")
PDBe <- border_remove(x = PDBe)
PDBe <- border_inner_h(PDBe, part="all", border = big_border )
PDBe <- border_inner_v(PDBe, part="all", border = big_border )
PDBe <- border_outer(PDBe, part="all", border = big_border )
PDBe <- bold(PDBe, i = 3, j = 2, bold = TRUE, part = "body")
PDBe <- add_header_lines(PDBe, values = "Purchases Day Book")
PDBe <- hline(PDBe, i = 2:3,border = brdr)
PDBe <- bold(PDBe, bold = TRUE, part = "header")
PDBe <- align(PDBe, align = "center")
PDBe <- align(PDBe, align = "center", part = "header")
PDBe <- height_all(PDBe, height = 1.3, unit  = "cm", part = "all")
PDBe <- height(PDBe, i = 1, height = 1.5, unit  = "cm", part = "header")
PDBe <- width(PDBe, j = 2, width = 3, unit  = "cm")
PDBe <- line_spacing(PDBe, i = 1:4, space = 1.6, part = "body")
save_as_image(PDBe, "PDBe.png")

```

CBP <- bold(CBP, i = 5, j = 2, bold = TRUE, part = "body")

CBP <- align(CBP, align = "center", part = "header")

CBP <- width(CBP, j = 1, width = 2.5, unit  = "cm")
CBP <- width(CBP, j = 2, width = 3, unit  = "cm")
CBP <- width(CBP, j = 3:6, width = 2.5, unit  = "cm")
CBP <- bg(CBP, j = 5:6, bg = "#aaadab", part = "header")
